graphql.query:
{
    site(id: "{{site_id}}") {
        allInstallations {
        id
        siteId
        name
        fqdn
        description
        unlinkedOn
        unlinkedBy
        linkStatus
        installationDate
        type
        totalAssets
        syncServerStatus
        lastAvailable
        version
        syncServer
        }
    }
}

graphql.query:
{
  site(id: "{{site_id}}") {
    softwares(key: "MTExM1kNTU3MjA0YS1kYTFlLTRkNWMtYTlmMC1C1Bc3NldChMzAxYjlhODBlZmU="
    orderDirection: DESC
    orderBy: "softwares.release"
    fields: [ "softwares.installDate",
              "softwares.lastChanged",
              "softwares.currentUser",
              "softwares.msi",
              "softwares.name",
              "softwares.publisher",
              "softwares.operatingSystem",
              "softwares.version",
              "softwares.release",
              "softwares.architecture",
              "softwares.status",
              "softwares.error",]) {
      total
      items
    }
  }
}
